bugs.title: Direct URL navigation shows Home page instead of target page
bugs.description: Navigating directly to /contacts, /properties, or /pipeline URLs would show the Home page content instead of the expected page. The issue was a race condition in RoleContext.tsx where loading state was set to false before auth finished loading.
bugs.rootCause: RoleContext set loading=false when profile was null, even during auth initialization
bugs.fix: Added authLoading dependency and wait for both auth and profile before setting loading=false

bugs.title: Pipeline UI shows $0 values despite deals existing in database
bugs.description: The Pipeline page showed empty columns with $0 values for all stages, even though deals with proper values existed in the database.
bugs.rootCause: Supabase query failed with 'Could not embed because more than one relationship was found for deals and contacts'. The deals table has multiple FKs to contacts (contact_id, co_buyer_contact_id, co_seller_contact_id) and Supabase didn't know which to use.
bugs.fix: Explicitly specified FK relationships in query: contacts!contact_id(...) and properties!property_id(...)

bugs.title: Deal Detail Sheet shows minimal content (only Close button)
bugs.description: Clicking on a deal card in the Pipeline opens the DealDetailSheet but it only shows a Close button with no deal information, milestones, or other content visible.
bugs.stepsToReproduce: 1. Navigate to /pipeline/buyers, 2. Click on any deal card (e.g., Marcus Johnson), 3. Observe the sheet opens with only a Close button
bugs.rootCause: Same as BUG-003: Supabase query used ambiguous FK relationships for contacts(...) and properties(...) without specifying which FK to use
bugs.fix: Explicitly specified FK relationships: contacts!contact_id(...) and properties!property_id(...)
